analysis.description:
ERC20.withdraw (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dae0680f6b8059c8945de6a8a93009e054417b4.sol#167-169) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dae0680f6b8059c8945de6a8a93009e054417b4.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0x1dae0680f6b8059c8945de6a8a93009e054417b4.sol:
	- pragma solidity>=0.4.22<0.6.0 (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dae0680f6b8059c8945de6a8a93009e054417b4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_contract' of ERC20.withdraw (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dae0680f6b8059c8945de6a8a93009e054417b4.sol#168-169) is not in mixedCase
